text: RT @Kathy_Novak: New year hug from @juliagillard as the PM visits the Hyunh family in Sydney http://t.co/58Gb1kGY
RT @AzerbaijanPA: Congratulation of Ilham Aliyev on the Day of Solidarity of World Azerbaijanis and New Year on the People of Azerbaijan. http: // tc ...
2011 is behind. 2011 was a successful year for our country. In 2011, the main tasks facing the country were resolved.
Our non-oil economy has grown by more than 10%, which is a clear example of the reforms that have taken place in previous years.
We already have over $ 40 billion in foreign exchange reserves. #Azerbaijan
About 100,000 new jobs have been created this year in the country. #Azerbaijan
Monetary income of the population has increased by about 20 percent. Inflation rate is about 8 percent. #Azerbaijan
According to the results of 2011, poverty will be less than 8%. The unemployment rate is 5.5%. Our country is developing dynamically and successfully.
This year, the average pension of about 900,000 pensioners has increased by nearly 40 percent. #Azerbaijan
Concrete steps are being taken to modernize the country. A brutal struggle against corruption and bribery is under way. #Azerbaijan
The Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict is the most unsettled issue. #Azerbaijan
Unfortunately, Armenia's non-constructive position is reflected in the negotiation process (cont) http://t.co/4PdonEgq
We will continue our diplomatic efforts. We have a principled position in the negotiations. We will not step back from this position
Nagorno-Karabakh is an ancient Azerbaijani land. The international community recognizes and supports the territorial integrity of Azerbaijan.
Azerbaijani citizens must return to all occupied lands, including Nagorno-Karabakh and Shusha. #Azerbaijan
In 2011, our military spending exceeded $ 3 billion. This is more than all the expenses of Armenia. #Azerbaijan
In 2011 great achievements were achieved in the field of energy, which is very important for our country. #Azerbaijan
All necessary transit agreements were signed in 2011. There are all opportunities to transport Azerbaijani gas to the world.
I think big investments should be made in our rich gas fields in 2012. #Azerbaijan
In 2011 a very important event took place for our country. For the first time, Azerbaijan has been a member of the UN Security Council. #Azerbaijan
This is a great historic victory. I think that our greatest victory in the 20 years of independence. #Azerbaijan
155 countries of the world gave their voice to Azerbaijan, believed in Azerbaijan, supported our policy. #Azerbaijan
This year is the 20th anniversary of our independence. Twenty years have been hard times and good days. #Azerbaijan
There were even more beautiful days. I am absolutely convinced that in the future only good times are waiting for us. #Azerbaijan
Today, at the same time, is the Solidarity Day of the World Azerbaijanis. #Azerbaijan
I greet all the Azerbaijanis living in the world today and express my respect and love to them. #Azerbaijan
All the Azerbaijanis living in the world know that there is an independent and strong Azerbaijani state in the world. #Azerbaijan
I congratulate all the world's Azerbaijanis on this wonderful holiday. #Azerbaijan
It starts in 2012. I am absolutely convinced that in 2012 alone our country is waiting for success. #Azerbaijan
I wish all citizens, all the Azerbaijani people good health, happiness and family happiness. Happy Holidays! #Azerbaijan
Happy New Year to all Lebanese! May 2012 bring all of you happiness and stability to our country -MS
@AmalAbdinur Thanks for a nice conversation. Glad you are #Optimist for 2012.

@SMujungu We have undertaken a comprehensive review of the mineral sector.
@SMujungu Accountability and transparency have been matters of essence.The two are underpinned in our new Mineral Policy and the Mining Law.
@SMujungu In promoting accountability & transparency, TMAA was introduced to enable the government monitor operations of mining companies.
@SMujungu Before TMAA, mining companies were the only source of information. There was nobody to ascertain the veracity of the information.

In Arica we delivered their apartments to 130 families who lived too long in the area polluted by polymetals http://t.co/CjRo2NLM
The Environmental Health Center of Arica attended more than 10,000 people affected by polymetals in 2010 and almost 20,000 in 2011.
This year begins the demolition of the contaminated sector of Cerro Chuño and the relocation of all families in decent and safe housing.
